Avaaz Foundation - fully REMOTE

We're a global activism organization, dedicated to effecting positive change in the world. We tackle such issues as climate change, poverty, and corruption. For more information, check here: http://www.avaaz.org/en/about.php#howwework We are in the process of extracting microservices from a large legacy php codebase. We primarily use python for new systems. We operate at "big data" scale, with 40+ million members, and hundreds of millions of events per month. We value professionalism, autonomy, and healthy work-life balance. We are looking for:

- Senior Software Developers https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0ywj

- A DevOps Engineer https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0hipk

- A Data Scientist https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0h1tp

- A Technical Project Manager (EU timezone) - https://avaaz22194.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk0h5k3
